barchartb138f5538aa2df68d16cf66b669c454e:
- Bars: "year" or "country"
- Size: "budget" (can be any of the options given)
geomapb138f5538aa2df68d16cf66b669c454e:
Country would be assigned to the "country" column, as it contains the string representation of the countries.
Size could be assigned to the "budget" column, and the specific size calculation (average, count, count unique, max, min, sum, median, csv or csv unique) would depend on the specific requirements of the visualization or analysis.
